welcome_message_body: Welcome to Balanga, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of this historic city known for its bustling markets, delicious cuisine, and beautiful landscapes. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Balanga has to offer.

restaurants.name: Wa-Nam Restaurant
restaurants.description: Wa-Nam Restaurant is a chinese restaurant located in Lungsod ng Balanga.
restaurants.address: Capitol drive, 2100 Lungsod ng Balanga, Bataan
